repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: New York State Normal School Student Portraits Collection

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: State Normal School (Albany, N. Y.) - Students

did.abstract: This collection sholds several photo albums of students and faculty that were created by members of the State Normal School.
did.physloc: All materials are located onsite in the Department.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged in its original order.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: During the time of the State Normal School's existence it was customary to create scrap books filled with photographs for departing faculty and students. Typically a photogrpah of the student or faculty member would be provided along with a note on the back intended for the recipient of the book. This collection holdsd a few examples of these early versions of the college yearbook that exist today.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection holds three photo albums complete with photos an dnotes from faculty and students, as well as a selection of loose cabinet cards of students from the class of 1889. The 1874 book was made from photos collected by Mina Williams, a former student, who presented it to the school on its 100th birthday. The 1885 book was created by the aunt of a student and presented to her on her graduation day. The 1888 album was created by staff of the school for a departing professor.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this record group is unrestricted.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: All items in this collection were transferred to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, The State Normal School Photo Albums, 1874-1889. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the State Normal School Photo Albums).

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection was processed in 2017 by Erik Stolarski
